summary:
Mad Moxxi from Borderlands franchise is visiting Skyrim now as fully standalone follower.
(this is my own version of this character so dont expect her to look exact as her appearance in borderlands games)
descriptionHtml:
[quote][u][font=Comic Sans MS][i][size=6]﻿[font=Georgia]Mad Moxxi from Borderlands ![/font][/size][/i][/font][/u][font=Georgia]
[/font]
[i]Features.[/i][i]
-----------[/i][i]--------[/i][i]-
She is skilled in assassination, dual weapons (daggers, swords)  and different Bows & Modern Weapons (Assault Rifles , Guns, and etc. If you use modern
weapons mods , Moxxi can use them)
[/i][i][/i][i]- Dual Combat Style (she is great with her dual pistols she is equipped by default and can deal pretty heavy damage to her enemies and will support you in any hard battle that may happen during your adventures)[/i][i][/i][i] [/i][i]

- She will appear in her own outfit , which you can see in preview pictures and will be equipped with 2 deadly guns. This guns have an ability to instant kill
just about anyone so, if you dont want her to use this guns , please donwload version of Mad Moxxi without this guns or use UFO and through
the follower menu take out this guns from her inventory.[/i][i][/i][i] [/i][i][/i][i]

WARNING - MAD MOXXI VERSION WITH GUNS WONT BE WORKING WITH MY OTHER FOLLOWER MOD - [u]LADY FROM DEVIL MAY CRY[/u] , IF YOU WANT TO USE BOTH FOLLOWERS PLEASE DOWNLOAD MOXXI VERSION WITHOUT GUNS OR DONT INSTALL LADY !
[/i][i][/i][i] [/i][i][/i][i]
Location.
----------------

Mad Moxxi could be found in Whiterun Drunken Huntsman Inn ! (i did this mod quite some time ago, and if she is not there, message me pls and i will update her location ASAP. )(If she is not there try Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn, all followers i created i always put in one of these 2 locations. So she should be in one of these inns.)


Skills and Perks[/i][i]
-------------------------------[/i][i][/i][i]-
- Dual Flurry, Dual Savagery & Armsman 60% - perks.

[/i][i]- She is silent killer -Light Foot (she wont trigger traps), also Backstab  Stealth80%, Muffed Movement, Silence, Assassins Blade - perks.[/i][i]

- Agile Defender (she will Increase armor rating for Light armor by 80%)[/i][i]

- Additionaly - Custom Fit and Unhindered and WindWalker perks for Light Armor.

[/i][i]- She is skilled with bows - Overdraw, Death Aim, Critical Shot, perks included.[/i][i]- Sandbox is included.[/i][i]- UNPB-BBP body version.[/i][i]

- She LVL UP with player from 1 - 90lvl.

[/i][i]- She is marriageable[/i][i]- BBP physics for Butt & Breast (If you want this to work you need to have HDT Physics Extention plugin installed before this mod)[/i][i]


Additional Content.[/i][i]
-------------------------------------[/i][i][/i][i]

1. Set Of Clothes UNP (this is not her original clothes from BORDERLANDS games)[/i][i] [/i][i]

2 She is equpped with two powerful modern guns.

WARNING -[/i][i]This guns have a very high chance for instant kill, so it means that she can
kill any creature/monster/enemy with one single shot.[/i][i]So if you want more challenge in combat give her 2 daggers or two short swords, or katanas and she will be able to use them for close combat and guns for far away targets. Or take out, this 2 guns from her inventory[/i][i] and give her completely new weapons by your choice if you dont want her to kill enemies with instant kill skill.[/i][i] 

[code][/code]Requirements[/i]
-------------------------------------------------
[size=3][i]1. This Follower required SKSE installed (latest version)[/i][/size][size=3][i][/i][/size][size=3][i]2. Latest Skyrim version[/i][/size][size=3][i][/i][/size][size=3][i]3. Latest vers. of UFO is recommended for any of my followers mods. They are working with UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul) just great.[/i][/size][size=3][i][/i][/size][size=3][i]4. HDT Physics Extention Plugin latest stable version is needed if you want to see BBP physics active.[/i][/size][size=3][i][/i][/size][size=3][i]My followers are very friendly with UFO , Convenient Horses, The Dance Of Death, Stealth Kills, and Martial Arts mods.

[/i][/size][size=3][i]
Installation  process.[/i][/size][size=3][i]
-----------------------------------[/i][/size][size=3][i]
You dont need anything else exept files inside zipped folder.[/i][/size][size=3][i]Simply use NMM for install/uninstall.[/i][/size][size=3][i][/i][/size][size=3][i]Or do it manually, just like any other mod.[/i][/size][size=3][i][/i][/size]
[size=3][i]Uninstall process.
-------------------------------
Simply delete all files you copied earlier in your skyrim folder.
[/i][/size][size=3][i]
All is very easy.

Additional info
-------------------------
She dont have custom voice and uses one of the skyrim default voice packs.
